oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maxwell House Coffee Advertisement, 1928 October
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A magazine advertisement for Maxwell House Coffee that appeared in the October 1928 issue of Good Housekeeping. The advertisement tells the story of Joel Cheek's quest to create the perfect blend of coffee. The Maxwell House Hotel in Nashville, Tennessee is where Joel Cheek's famous blend was served for years, starting in 1892, before getting nation-wide fame and settling in grocery markets across the country. The advertisement shows a painted rendition of Cheek working on perfecting his coffee blend. Forms part of the Businesses Ephemera Subject Files. 1 advertisement : col. ; 11.5 x 8 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cheek, Joel Owsley, 1852-1935
